sentences.en: Behind the mocking laughter lurks a growing sense of unease.
sentences.cn: 嘲笑声的背后潜伏着一种越来越强烈的不安。
福斯特也跟着笑了起来。

sentences.en: He burst into uncontrollable laughter at something I'd said.
sentences.cn: 听了我的话，他禁不住大笑起来。

sentences.en: He could no longer hold back convulsive laughter.
sentences.cn: 他再也忍不住，前俯后仰地大笑起来。

sentences.en: He delivered the line perfectly, and everybody roared with laughter.
sentences.cn: 那句台词他拿捏得恰到好处，引得众人哈哈大笑。

sentences.en: He looked shocked, then burst into laughter (= started laughing ).
sentences.cn: 他一脸的震惊，接着便放声大笑起来。

sentences.en: He roared with laughter, shaking in his chair.
sentences.cn: 他放声大笑，笑得身子在椅子上直颤。

sentences.en: He tossed back his head in a howl of berserk laughter.
His laughter seemed a little strained.
sentences.cn: 他的笑声好像有点不自然。

sentences.en: My attempt to fix it sent Lawrence into fits of laughter.
sentences.cn: 我试着修理它，却让劳伦斯乐得前仰后合。

sentences.en: My interests: eating out, fun nights in, music and laughter.
sentences.cn: 我的爱好是：到外面上馆子，晚上在家娱乐，听音乐，寻乐子。

sentences.en: Newington threw his head back and cackled with laughter.
She cut him off with a wild bray of laughter.
sentences.cn: 她用刺耳的狂笑打断了他的讲话。

sentences.en: The whole room roared with laughter.
sentences.cn: 整个房间的人都大笑起来。

sentences.en: They heard a bottle being smashed, then more raucous laughter.
sentences.cn: 他们听见酒瓶摔碎的声音，然后是一阵更喧闹的笑声。

sentences.en: They laugh so hard they double up with laughter.
sentences.cn: 他们捧腹大笑，直不起身来。

words.tran_cn: 好笑的事情,令人愉快的事情

phrases.tran_cn: 捧腹大笑；笑得直不起腰
又哭又笑;欢乐与悲伤[亦作 tears and laughter]

trans.tran_en: when people laugh, or the sound of people laughing
